EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Opportunity.Account}, Greetings of the day, Thank you for your interest in {!Opportunity.Project__c}, one of our exclusive and state-of-the-art projects. We do understand that you have a busy schedule, so in case you want to reschedule your appointment, or if you have any other questions, feel free to give us a call at 020-67166716 and one of our executives will be more than happy to help you. Thank you, Warm regards, Team SOLITAIRE.
